import { Interactive, getScriptName } from '../../index.js';
let interactive = new Interactive(getScriptName());
interactive.plot(600, 300, Math.sin, {
    originX: 0,
    originY: 150,
    scaleX: 300 / Math.PI,
    scaleY: 300 / Math.PI,
    zoomable: false,
    grid: true
});
